## catchLater() function

Avoid `UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning` if a promise fails before we `await` it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function catchLater<T>(promise: Promise<T>): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  promise | Promise&lt;T&gt; | A promise to ignore for now (will be caught later) |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T&gt;

## Example


```javascript
const emailPromise = catchLater(getMail(...));
await ...
const email = await emailPromise;

```
